The brazier doesn't appear to hold any obvious mechanism for lighting itself, but you notice a basin at its base that is coated with dried blood.
As you pour the foul-smelling liquid into the basin, it drains away into the depths of the brazier.
You hear a faint rumbling, though you cannot be sure from where it comes. All at once the brazier flares to life, its flames casting dancing shadows upon the surrounding walls.
Once the second brazier is lit, you hear a loud, scraping rumble of stone, followed by a rush of air like the sigh of a great beast.
Your keen ears pick out other sounds soon enough: the clacking of teeth, and the hissing that rises from the open pit behind you.
Set within the basin is a raised crest, bearing the crest of Old Vailia.
Nearly obscured by the encrusted blood is a small crest, bearing geometric shapes. You do not recognize the crest, but it appears Huana in style.
